MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the EH14 postcode area of Edinburgh, affecting properties in Lanark Road and surrounding streets. We are aware of the recent faults and do apologise for the inconvenience caused during this difficult period and we are working to get supplies restored. We have now located an underground cable fault on Lanark Road and we now need to excavate and complete a permanent repair and we expect your supply to be restored by 6pm. We understand that being without power is frustrating and please be assured we will restore your supply as soon as we possibly can. If for any reason this information changes then we will update this message. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 1:20 PM on Monday, 15 February 2021.
